name: AtriCure, Inc.
description: AtriCure, Inc. is a medical device company specializing in the development and commercialization of innovative technologies for the treatment of atrial fibrillation (AF) and other cardiac arrhythmias. Founded in 2000 and headquartered in Mason, Ohio, AtriCure is driven by its commitment to improving patient outcomes through its advanced surgical solutions. The company offers a range of products that include energy-based technologies for cardiac tissue ablation, which are designed to restore normal heart rhythm while minimizing damage to surrounding tissue. AtriCure's flagship products, such as the Isolator™ Synergy Ablation System, have gained recognition for their effectiveness in treating AF during surgical procedures. With a focus on both the surgical and minimally invasive markets, AtriCure is at the forefront of innovation in the cardiac space, continuously conducting research to expand its product portfolio and enhance its existing technologies. The company is also dedicated to education and training, providing resources for surgeons and healthcare professionals to improve their skills in treating AF. AtriCure's mission is to transform the treatment landscape for arrhythmias, ultimately leading to better health outcomes for patients worldwide.
